definition: York Chow or Chow Yat-ngok (1947-), Hong Kong doctor and politician, Secretary for Health, Welfare and Food since 2004
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge

sentences.english: York Chow, Hong Kong's Secretary for Food and Health, also attended the event.
sentences.chinese: 香港食物及衛生局局長周一嶽也出席了該活動。

sentences.english: He restated that Hong Kong is "unlikely to be spared from local infection".
sentences.chinese: 周一嶽重申，香港難以免除社區感染的發生。
